name: Recovery (zachhbeavers)
description:
"Recovery" is a platform game where you play as "Berri" the Cat. You set out to find the fragments of a heart to refill the heart your friend "Innares" is losing and Dying from. 

(Note: Beginning Cutscene is bugged for browser, watch YouTube playthrough to see intact cutscene)


Controls:

Left = A 

Right = D

Jump = W or (Spacebar)

Credits:

Pablo Garcia-Rico - Programing

Christin Lee - Art

Zach Beavers - Level Design / UI

Game Engine: 

Godot
